subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 31 points and the Mavericks won a playoff series for the first time since 2006, eliminating the Spurs with a 106-93 victory.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 31 points and the Mavericks won a playoff series for the first time since 2006, eliminating the Spurs with a 106-93 victory.
